creator: Jerry McAuley
description:
LibriVox recording of Transformed; or, the History of a River Thief, Briefly Told by Jerry McAuley.
Read in English by Curt Walton

Jerry McAuley gives a testimony of his transformation from one of the wickedest men to ever live to being saved and a life of helping others do the same. (Summary by Curt Walton)

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;spiritual transformation
title: Transformed; or, the History of a River Thief, Briefly Told
